name: primal_in_the_mane
text: This strip kicks off one of the best possible months from history. Am I wrong?

name: zem
text: No. You are right.

name: cracklewater
text:
This strip is the last appearance of awkward, arm-hugged-to-the-body, leery-eyed Little Nephew.

I sometimes miss him.

name: cracklewater
text:
My mistake

He appears in at least one more strip.

name: weretrout
text: Chubby for the avatar.

name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by SoManyWhales, VictoriaW, dj)

name: yingkaixing
text: I would buy that album.

name: shirt145
text: Word, algebra be wack, yo.  Don' need no algae in ma bra, ho. Wicky wicky what?

name: johnnyrocker
text:
Man that song would be all over the place.
I need focus in my pretentiously intellectual rap.

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kenthegod, keithcozz, shoinan)

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Seems pretty intentional, though (on Onstad's part, that is). Ray singles out a weak rhyme to dis LN's project. Hence the wince afterwards.

name: tekende
text: "hence the wince"

name: apocowarg
text: "Can take it in the dumper", more than makes up for the forced rhyme.

name: jstegall
text: I sent this strip to my old algebra professor from high school ...she hasn't replied.

name: stuart
text: I have succesfully repressed the urge to send obscene webcomics to my old teachers in high school, although why I repress this urge I don't know. Maybe because I don't want to be remembered as "that kid who's always sending us comics with curse words in them at work"? Anymore?

name: satellitetv
text: Is little nephew wincing at the lyric or Ray's glower?

name: gouldgonewild
text: I think he's trying not to laugh at his own lyric.

name: relaxing
text: Wincing at the lyric, I hope.

name: phy
text: Ray instinctively went for the most bogus lyric on the album. Little Nephew was hoping he wouldn't notice.

name: scottintheway
text: I think probably both. Although that lyric is nothing to wince about.

name: hellofyellin
text:
I like "Fuck... Algebra!" sounds like it could be the first in a series.

Fuck... Early Modern European History!

name: relaxing
text: Fuck... 19th Century American Literature!

name: jlynes
text: Fuck... Stratigraphy and Sedimentology!

name: erinye
text: Fuck... The Sociology Of Death And Dying!

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Fuck... Philosophical Theology!

name: badganjil
text: Fuck... stoichiometry!

name: bixschmix
text: I was just going for stoichiometry, when I found that some Internet Person had gotten there before me. Oh, the wonders of Achewood.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Fuck... pointer arithmetic!

name: catgrl131
text: Fuck... Sex Ed!

name: howl
text: Fuck... computational linguistics!

name: taiga81
text: Fuck... Game Theory!

name: catgrl131
text: Chinga...¡Español!

name: boredom_man
text: Fuck... Luis Bunuel!

name: deusoma
text: Man, your elementary school was hardcore. I don't even know what that means .

name: jlynes
text:
If I'm reading the reply indents right (fuck you, Assetbar!) I think this was in response to me.

If it was, S&S is the study and mapping of sedimentary layering and deposits, and how those layers are shifted and altered by uplift and other geological processes.

If it wasn't, then I accept any forthcoming lames with grace and tact.

name: deusoma
text: No no, that was totally directed at you. Chubby for a "The More You Know" moment.

name: sirfrederick
text: Nooooooooooo!

name: charchar
text: Fuck...Advanced Placement Music Theory!

name: rumblefish
text:
Fucce...Romani

This one might be a little obscure.

name: cagliostro
text:
Chubbied for obscurity.

although it would have to be 'Romanos' acc. pl.
oh god just leave me to die here

name: closefriend
text: I'm a college math instructor. This is going in my office.

name: rogergs
text: Little Nephew put his name in the "N.W.A." font.

name: songbirdspectre
text: Ah, Little Nephew. He is so embarassed.

name: johnnygeo
text: Is this the first mention of the Sexual Homeboys and/or that Ray actually has a record label?

name: stuart
text:
*does search*

...Holy crap, it IS!

name: j03y
text: dissing algebra isnt cool.

name: mercuri0us
text: Yes it is.

name: boredom_man
text: It is a good thing during a large party or a basic time of dudes.

name: invidious
text: I can't wait for the follow-up album... something about "calculus" and "gang-rape."

name: mercuri0us
text: fuck... DIFFERENTIAL CALCULUS!

name: cpnglxynchos
text: LIKE A STUDENT

name: oyster
text: Is little nephew's right arm magnetically attracted to his left elbow? Or does he just have left elbow psoriosis?

name: slab64
text: That is the preferred stance of a young person who is not yet sure of themselves. It fades with time.

name: envika
text: this one and the next are still my favorite Achewood strips.

name: c_dizzle
text: !!!! :cD  <~~(scientist with sensibilities of a 12-year-old finds this strip particularly enjoyable)

name: highpitch_83
text: Panel 6: Little Nephew knows that rhyme was whack but he cannot quell the Smuckles Entreprenureal spirit!

name: echidnaboy
text: The concept of the variable is all, "Dang, I never thought it would be like this!"

name: watt
text: I love how the "..." builds suspense for the inevitable fucking of the Algebra.

name: fancyrat
text: I'm beginning to think that LN has his right arm permanently attached to his other elbow.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i couldnt agree more with the li'l guy.  algebra is a blight on mankind.  like white power.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Ray went to a bro-awesome elementary school if he was learning algebra in third grade.

name: lolsworth
text: I would buy this. Fuck Algebra. Fuck all bullshit mathematics. Imaginary numbers? Man, why you bothering me with these numbers if they ain't even real? Fuck you.
